name.description: Identifies the asset to which this token represents

symbol.description: Describes the asset to which this token represents

token_uri.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this token represents. Consider making any images at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive.  Conditionally Optional.

external_uri.description: A URI pointing to an externally hosted resources.
